programme.title: Scooby-Doo And Guess Who? S1
programme.desc: When Daphne's makeup vlog lands her as the prime consultant to the famous rock band the Hex Girls, our gang find themselves embroiled in a rockin' mystery.

programme.title: Scooby-Doo And Guess Who? S1

programme.title: Scooby-Doo And Guess Who? S2
programme.desc: When investigating a haunted old hospital Scooby Doo and the gang meet up with actor and comedian Kristen Schaal. The gang happily invites her to be a part of their mystery solving group and she's ecstatic. She tags along with our gang helping them solve the mystery of the horrible ghost of Dr. Phineas Phrag. More genetically enhanced monster than man he's been lurking in this hospital since it closed down in the 1950s and he threatens to destroy any trespassers who dare set foot in these creepy old wards. Can our gang and Ms. Schaal discover the truth of this haunted hospital before it's too late? More importantly can Kristen Schaal find out how she best fits into our group? So many fun choices - so little time!

programme.title: Boss Baby: Back in Business
programme.desc: Boss promises Tim he'll help make their parents' anniversary present, but after Puppy Co. and Baby Corp's fight over a conference room escalates, he sends Hendershot is his stead. Hendershot, armed with a file on all of Tim's wants and needs, tries to keep Tim happy.

programme.title: Boss Baby: Back in Business
programme.desc: Boss tries to rename the local soccer team to "The Babies", but after Danny gets involved in the popularity race with his name, "The Hot Dogs", the town becomes divided. Boss creates a crack team of Baby Corp employees to game plan solutions to the worst outcomes.

programme.title: Boss Baby: Back in Business
programme.desc: Boss arranges a sleepover with Quiet Psycho Baby to get access to her father the Mayor's day planner, hoping to plant his own pro-baby agenda. Tim sneaks into an art film and decides he has to be a grown-up now, so Mom and Dad try to "kid" him up again.

programme.title: The Epic Tales of Captain Underpants
programme.desc: In part one of a two-part season finale, the Melvins create a final exam that George and Harold will be sure to fail: the Doom Dome. To ensure success, Melvinborg injects Melvin's cells with nanobots, giving him heightened powers. But when George and Harold find out, they crank the nanobots to the max, causing Melvin to grow into a giant! The boys enlist Captain Underpants to fight the jealous nerd, but their victory only loses the nanobots onto Piqua...

programme.title: The Epic Tales of Captain Underpants
programme.desc: Part two of the season finale finds George, Harold, Captain Underpants, and the Melvins trapped in the Doom Dome with rampaging nanobots. When the humans try to neautralize the bots, they find a new host: Captain Underpants. Now they must shrink down to go into Captain Underpants’ brain and defeat the nanobots’ leader, Nanozero. But they need help: Captain Underpants’ brain cells to the rescue! And when it’s all over, George and Harold will finally be able to go to summer camp.

programme.title: The Epic Tales of Captain Underpants
programme.desc: Harold and George can't wait to spend the summer together at camp. But not so fast, boys -- your old nemesis Mr. Krupp has a most unpleasant surprise.

programme.title: Home: Adventures With Tip And Oh!
programme.desc: Tip and Oh's plan to save Elrod turns into a battle to save earth from Elrod

programme.title: Turbo F.A.S.T.

programme.title: Dinotrux
programme.desc: Revvithelps Ty unlock his ultimate power to rescue all their friends trapped inside a magnetized mountain by D-Structs, Splitter, Blayde and Pounde

programme.title: Where's Wally?

programme.title: Postman Pat: Special Delivery Service
programme.desc: Lauren and Sara lead a camping trip to the Scottish Highlands, but disaster strikes when Ajay and PC Selby are stuck in Pencaster with the tent and cooking equipment. Pat must transport them to the Highlands in the SDS Plane and put up the tent before nightfall in order to accomplish his mission. When a Highland cow gets into the tent and refuses to leave, Pat comes up with a plan for Alf to team up with Bill and coax the cow out with their father-and-son cow call - and Bill helps Alf move his own cow, who turns out to be missing Bill.

programme.title: Raa Raa The Noisy Lion
programme.desc: Topsy sets out to make her own book for story time, but everything goes wrong when Raa Raa decides to join her. Can he put things right in time?

programme.title: Noddy Toyland Detective
programme.desc: New stickers, with a picture of a mysterious bandit, have appeared in Toyland. Clockwork Mouse begs Noddy to investigate. He finds himself going head to head with jealous Hoof who wants to prove that Noddy isn't the only investigator in Toyland. Hoof thinks he's solved the case in no time, but Noddy's attention to detail makes him realise the bandit isn't quite what he seems. Following all the clues Noddy realises that there isn't a sticker bandit at all! The stickers are flyers for a new play that Pat-Pat is putting on for all the toys. She is the ‘sticker bandit” – a character in the play! Panic over, everyone settles down to enjoy the show. Well done, Noddy!

programme.title: Fifi and the Flowertots
programme.desc: Primrose has decided to hold a party for Fifi. Everyone is helping get it ready, even Stingo and Slugsy who are in charge of making the cake. What could possibly go wrong?

programme.desc: Chef J tells a tale about unicorns sailing in ships on clouds in search of Unicorn Land.

programme.title: The Epic Tales of Captain Underpants
programme.desc: Harold and George don't ask for much -- just a fun scavenger hunt that doesn't include doing Krupp's errands. Careful what you wish for, fellas.

programme.title: Go, Dog. Go!

programme.title: Go, Dog. Go!

programme.title: Dragons: Defenders of Berk
programme.desc: Hiccup, Toothless, and the dragon riders discover an injured Scauldron on the shores of Changewing Island. When the Scauldron takes a shine to Ruffnut, the kids see a chance to heal the dragon and return him safely to the ocean, before he falls victim to the elements, as well as the territorial Changewings.

programme.title: Boss Baby: Back in Business
programme.desc: Boss promises Tim he'll help make their parents' anniversary present, but after Puppy Co. and Baby Corp's fight over a conference room escalates, he sends Hendershot is his stead. Hendershot, armed with a file on all of Tim's wants and needs, tries to keep Tim happy.

programme.title: Boss Baby: Back in Business
programme.desc: Boss tries to rename the local soccer team to "The Babies", but after Danny gets involved in the popularity race with his name, "The Hot Dogs", the town becomes divided. Boss creates a crack team of Baby Corp employees to game plan solutions to the worst outcomes.

programme.title: Boss Baby: Back in Business
programme.desc: Boss arranges a sleepover with Quiet Psycho Baby to get access to her father the Mayor's day planner, hoping to plant his own pro-baby agenda. However, staying up all night has the unexpected consequence of delusional over-tiredness! Tim sneaks into an art film and decides he has to be a grown-up now, so Mom and Dad try to "kid" him up again.

programme.title: The Epic Tales of Captain Underpants
programme.desc: In part one of a two-part season finale, the Melvins create a final exam that George and Harold will be sure to fail: the Doom Dome. To ensure success, Melvinborg injects Melvin's cells with nanobots, giving him heightened powers. But when George and Harold find out, they crank the nanobots to the max, causing Melvin to grow into a giant! The boys enlist Captain Underpants to fight the jealous nerd, but their victory only loses the nanobots onto Piqua...

programme.title: The Epic Tales of Captain Underpants
programme.desc: Part two of the season finale finds George, Harold, Captain Underpants, and the Melvins trapped in the Doom Dome with rampaging nanobots. When the humans try to neautralize the bots, they find a new host: Captain Underpants. Now they must shrink down to go into Captain Underpants’ brain and defeat the nanobots’ leader, Nanozero. But they need help: Captain Underpants’ brain cells to the rescue! And when it’s all over, George and Harold will finally be able to go to summer camp.

programme.title: The Epic Tales of Captain Underpants
programme.desc: Harold and George can't wait to spend the summer together at camp. But not so fast, boys -- your old nemesis Mr. Krupp has a most unpleasant surprise.

programme.title: Home: Adventures With Tip And Oh!
programme.desc: Tip and Oh's plan to save Elrod turns into a battle to save earth from Elrod

programme.title: Turbo F.A.S.T.
programme.desc: Skidmark and White Shadow try to stop spring from coming by keeping a groundhog in his hole; Smoove loses the power behind his effortless cool.

programme.title: Dinotrux
programme.desc: Revvithelps Ty unlock his ultimate power to rescue all their friends trapped inside a magnetized mountain by D-Structs, Splitter, Blayde and Pounde

programme.title: Where's Wally?
programme.desc: When Odlulu uses a Wake-A-Troll Key to get her kite down from a tree, she accidentally brings two mythical Icelandic creatures to life. Using their wits and some Icelandic troll knowledge, the Wanderers must find a way to turn these mischievous creatures back to rock.

programme.title: Postman Pat: Special Delivery Service
programme.desc: Lauren and Sara lead a camping trip to the Scottish Highlands, but disaster strikes when Ajay and PC Selby are stuck in Pencaster with the tent and cooking equipment. Pat must transport them to the Highlands in the SDS Plane and put up the tent before nightfall in order to accomplish his mission. When a Highland cow gets into the tent and refuses to leave, Pat comes up with a plan for Alf to team up with Bill and coax the cow out with their father-and-son cow call - and Bill helps Alf move his own cow, who turns out to be missing Bill.

programme.title: Raa Raa The Noisy Lion
programme.desc: Topsy sets out to make her own book for story time, but everything goes wrong when Raa Raa decides to join her. Can he put things right in time?

programme.title: Noddy Toyland Detective
programme.desc: New stickers, with a picture of a mysterious bandit, have appeared in Toyland. Clockwork Mouse begs Noddy to investigate. He finds himself going head to head with jealous Hoof who wants to prove that Noddy isn't the only investigator in Toyland. Hoof thinks he's solved the case in no time, but Noddy's attention to detail makes him realise the bandit isn't quite what he seems. Following all the clues Noddy realises that there isn't a sticker bandit at all! The stickers are flyers for a new play that Pat-Pat is putting on for all the toys. She is the ‘sticker bandit” – a character in the play! Panic over, everyone settles down to enjoy the show. Well done, Noddy!

programme.title: Fifi and the Flowertots
programme.desc: Primrose has decided to hold a party for Fifi. Everyone is helping get it ready, even Stingo and Slugsy who are in charge of making the cake. What could possibly go wrong?

programme.title: Not Quite Narwhal
programme.desc: Chef J tells a tale about unicorns sailing in ships on clouds in search of Unicorn Land.

programme.title: Dragons: Rescue Riders
programme.desc: The Rescue Riders plan to team up with the Slinkwings when an angry Grumblegard threatens Huttsgalor. But their old enemies may be up to new tricks.

programme.title: The Epic Tales of Captain Underpants
programme.desc: Harold and George don't ask for much -- just a fun scavenger hunt that doesn't include doing Krupp's errands. Careful what you wish for, fellas.

programme.title: Kung Fu Panda: The Dragon Knight
programme.desc: There is more epic action and intrigue as Po and the Dragon Knights continue their quest to destroy the Tianshang weapons, but find themselves in treacherous waters when they are captured by pirates, one of which is out for revenge against Mr. Ping! The adventures lead them to London, where they are wanted by the Knights. Old enemies resurface and Blade will have to face one of her most challenging opponents—her mom. And somehow, Po finds himself in a chess tournament against the Queen of England!

programme.title: Boss Baby: Back in Business
programme.desc: Boss Baby creates an org chart to cement his leadership as the Boss of the playgroup babies. However when Bubbeezee photographer Travis Le Duque chooses anyone but Boss for his coverspread;the status quo is upended! Tim continues to fail his class assignment: a model solar system

programme.title: Abominable and The Invisible City
programme.desc: Yi realizes that Peng and Everest were taken by Nian, the legendary dragon-like creature associated with Chinese New Year – and he’s also taken their other creature friends! With Burnish and Duchess’ help, Yi and Jin travel outside of the city to find Nian’s cave. But a skirmish in the cave drives the conflict with Nian back to the city, wreacking havoc on the festival. The crew and creatures band together to try to stop Nian, but they’re no match. Will Yi be able to create magic and connect with the troubled creature without Everest’s magic strings on her violin?

programme.title: Dragons: Defenders of Berk
programme.desc: Hiccup and the gang must rescue Stoick with assistance from… Berk’s archenemy Alvin.

programme.title: Trolls: The Beat Goes On!
programme.desc: When Poppy drops DJ Suki’s prized party-making possession in the lagoon, she and her friends must go on a submarine adventure to the lagoon floor in order to find it./When Branch uses an excuse to avoid going to a party- that he has plans with his “friend” Mr. Glittercakes- Poppy calls him out. But to both Branch and Poppy’s surprise, it turns out Mr. Glittercakes is real! Who is the mysterious Troll, and why has he chosen to help Branch?

programme.title: Not Quite Narwhal
programme.desc: Kelp and Scallop enlist Cruz’s help to perform a dance for Mom’s birthday. Though it’s hard at first, they learn to put their dolphin, unicorn, and narwhal powers together to create something special. / Kelp, Pixie, Ollie, and their friend Leroy try to help Juniper understand her angry feelings.

programme.title: Not Quite Narwhal
programme.desc: Scallop is afraid of her first “tuskist” appointment. Kelp helps her get through it with a song. / Fog rolls in, threatening Kelp’s first Three Moon Festival in Unicorn Land. Kelp and his friends use a combination of unicorn spark and the Kelp Way to create a new festival.

programme.title: Go, Dog. Go!
programme.desc: With a new family moving to town, Mayor Sniffington wants Pawston to look perfect. Tag and Scooch offer to help, but it's too many chores to do on their own, so Tag builds a robot to help. But when Frank and Beans catch wind of the robot, they try to swipe it so that it will do their personal chores. \ When Tag learns that Pawston's new fire chief is a cat, she leads a welcoming effort with the dogs of Pawston. But when their attempts to welcome Tom and Kit Whiskerton go awry, Tag realizes it's because they're only doing things that dogs would enjoy.

programme.title: Go, Dog. Go!
programme.desc: When Tag and Scooch get a once-in-a-lifetime chance to learn magic from Muttfield, Tag cannot wait to be the star of the end-of-class show. When Scooch outshines Tag with his natural gift for magic, Tag gets jealous and attempts a master level trick that goes awry. \ The dogs are shedding their winter coats and it's the day of the big Pawston Picnic. But when Spike alerts the Barkers that there's an incoming windstorm, it's up to Spike and Tag chase the storm while the Barkers try to convince the dogs of Pawston to go inside!

programme.title: Team Zenko Go
programme.desc: When accident-prone Rodney gets hired to babysit a mischievous toddler, TZG secretly watches over their safety. / When there’s a power outage in Harmony Harbor, TZG secretly helps the townsfolk beat the blackout.

programme.title: Team Zenko Go
programme.desc: When both Sam and Gabriel pre-order the new Commander Kale comic but the supplier only sends one copy, TZG secretly ferries the comic book back and forth between readers. / When Fawna teaches a silent yoga class, TZG secretly find and remove a loud chirping cricket from the Community Center.

programme.title: Dragons: Rescue Riders
programme.desc: When the other dragons come down with the flu, Summer must overcome her fear of eels to retrieve the cure and get her friends back in the air.

programme.desc: Puss stumbles upon the legendary hidden city of San Lorenzo, and soon finds himself forced to protect it from thieves.

programme.title: The Adventures Of Puss In Boots
programme.desc: Puss accidentally gives the orphans a magic substance that will ultimately make them explode. The only cure is guarded by a Sphinx who challenges Puss with riddles - and contrary to his own belief, Puss is not good at riddles.

programme.title: Spirit Riding Free
programme.desc: When the annual roundup and town dance brings cowboy Javier to Miradero Lucky finds a new friend who can teach her and Spirit a new trick.

programme.title: Spirit Riding Free
programme.desc: Mysteries collide when horse thieves strike Miradero at the same time as a pie thief strikes the church bake sale while the adults try to keep the horse thieves at bay Lucky is determined to find out who stole the pies.

programme.desc: Branch is training Keith for the big Flyer Bug Race, but he gets too caught up in his competition with Creek and his protégé./ When it appears Mr. Dinkles has developed an allergy to Biggie, Biggie must find a solution fast.

programme.title: Kungfu Stuntmen

programme.title: Frasier S5 E09 - Perspectives on Christmas

programme.title: CSI S3 E21 - Forever
programme.desc: The series enters its third season riding high as network television's top-rated drama. There is, therefore, no need for CBS to make any major cast changes, however, there are two significant additions to the cast lineup for season 3. A romantic interest is created for series regular Jorja Fox (Sara Sidle) in the form of Hank Peddigrew (Christopher Wiehl), a handsome paramedic. Also, recurring character Detective Lockwood ( Jeffrey D. Sams ) is seen on a more frequent basis. The season's most significant story development involves CSI head man Gil Grissom ( William L. Petersen ). After a few instances in which he notices that he is experiencing some hearing loss, Grissom is diagnosed with a hereditary disorder which threatens to culminate in total deafness. As the season draws to a close, Grissom undergoes surgery to correct this problem, however the results of the operation remain unclear until the beginning of season four.

programme.title: The Incredible Hulk S3 E13 - Long Run Home
programme.desc: You wouldn't like him when he's angry. You'll LOVE him! Follow the adventures of Dr. David Banner, a scientist who, after "an accidental overdose of gamma radiation interacts with his unique body chemistry", turns into a raging monster when agitated.

programme.title: Law & Order Special Victims Unit S10 E20 - Crush
programme.desc: The Special Victims Unit, a specially trained squad of dedicated detectives in the NYPD, who investigate these vicious felonies. These are their stories.

programme.desc: From the Great Depression to World War II, an American family living in the Blue Ridge Mountains of Virginia struggles to remain together in this heartwarming series, the winner of 13 Emmy Awards, that chronicles the lives of a people poor in material wealth but rich in spirit.

programme.title: Isinakdal Ko Ang Aking Ina
programme.desc: Can a mother forsake her child? She is a doctor, who almost has everything but despite her wealth, she is not happy. Unknown to her, the son she’s looking for is the very man who has been driving her around.

programme.title: Blondie
programme.desc: Lorna (Ilonah Jean) and her friends are gripped in fear as a serial killer is on the loose. But a pattern soon emerges. The victims are all men and a girl in blood wig is seen fleeing the scene of the crime.

programme.title: Bakit Bughaw Ang Langit?
programme.desc: Why is the sky blue? Why do we love the people we love? These are questions no one can answer. Because is just is.

programme.title: Brando Bandido
programme.desc: Would it be really a surprise if the enigmatic avenger "Brando Bandido" (Andy Poe) is actually Zardo's son, all grown-up and ready to get back at his father's killers?

programme.title: Oplan Baleleng
programme.desc: Oplan Baleleng was the name given to a paramilitary group made up of hardened convicts tasked with the rescue of kidnap for ransom victims. In truth though, theirs was a murder mission.

programme.title: Proboys
programme.desc: This is the story of five young women, their adventures and misadventures in their search for Mr. Right.

programme.title: Agaw-Armas
programme.desc: Benjie (Bong Revilla) is a hotel security officer who has just about everything going for him. His life seems almost perfect. Then, he is linked to a shooting incident tha may forever change his life.

programme.title: Grease Gun Gang
programme.desc: A renewed ex-convict (Robin Padilla) decided to change his friends’ lifestyle after he came out of the jail.

programme.title: Doctor, Doctor We Are Sick
programme.desc: The foursome, Vilma and TVJ played bumbling orderlies,whose work method was enough to send patients out of the hospital or to undeserved calamity, although they were, in truth, caring and kind-hearted and were only trying to do good.

programme.title: Walang Karugtong Ang Nakaraan
programme.desc: A widower found a strong resemblance between his late wife and the tutor of his daughter. Naive and very much in love, she obeyed his wishes and only later realized that he was not really in love with her but only with a memory.

programme.title: A Million Thanks
programme.desc: Asia's Queen of Song Pilita Corrales will feature her signature hits and popular Filipino songs in this one night concert.

programme.title: Mga Batang Riles
programme.desc: Mga Batang Riles

programme.title: Dahil Tanging Ikaw
programme.desc: Erika and Cecil are twins who were separated by poverty right after they were born. Each of them was caught up in her own existence, not knowing that somewhere not so far lived a twin. But one day, fate found a clever way to bring them back together.

programme.title: Laruan
programme.desc: Joy (Carmi Martin) has only one ambition in life--to get rich and give her family a more comfortable life. She enslaves herself to William (Mark Gil) in her hope that he will help her achieve her goal.

programme.title: Bloomberg: The Open
programme.desc: Jonathan Ferro hosts this programme showcasing the most insightful and informative Bloomberg charts to help position a global audience for the trading day.

programme.title: Bloomberg Markets: Americas
programme.desc: From New York, the most important global business and breaking markets news and information as it happens.

programme.title: Bloomberg Markets: European Close

programme.title: Geostorm
programme.desc: What if, in the wake of more than a decade of devastating weather events, we finally found a way to control Mother Nature and the destruction her tirades entail? When catastrophic climate change endangers Earth’s very survival, world governments unite and create Project Dutch Boy: a global net of satellites surrounding the planet that are armed with geo-engineering technologies designed to stave off the natural disasters. After successfully protecting the planet for two years, something is starting to go wrong. Two estranged brothers (Gerard Butler, Jim Sturgess) are tasked with solving the program’s malfunction before a worldwide geostorm can engulf the planet.

programme.title: Last Girl Standing

programme.title: Mid-night Two
programme.desc: Yi Cheng and his friends venture into a haunted mountain that hides an ancient corpse and an eternal ghostly flame. No one who enters the mountain ever returns and at 2:30 AM, Yi Cheng’s friends vanish one by one. While searching for them in the eerie forest, Yi Cheng enters a realm of infinite reincarnation, facing a series of terrifying events…

programme.title: The Windmill Massacre
programme.desc: Jennifer joins a tour to explore the renowned windmills of the Netherlands. As their tour coach breaks down on the way, they seek refuge in a creepy shed near a sinister windmill with a dark history. When some tour members suddenly disappear, Jennifer discovers a shared secret among them, linking their fates in a chilling revelation.

programme.title: Fate Jealous Greed
programme.desc: The film consists of three short horror stories: a man tries to survive after he received a haunted mail predicting his death; while a man mourns the death of his beloved wife, she becomes a ghost and tries to communicate with him; three brothers clash over the care options of their elderly mother during dinner, leading to a terrifying murder.

programme.title: Red Rain
programme.desc: Based on true events, a young scientist who specialises in the study of aliens and extraterrestrials sets out to uncover the mystery behind a series of strange occurrences in Kerala.

programme.title: Dead in the Water
programme.desc: When aspiring photography vlogger Tara gets dumped by her long term boyfriend, her best friend Amy takes her on a weekend getaway to her family's vacation lake house. It is there that they encounter a mysterious and charming man who forces them to face their demons.

programme.title: The Nightmares
programme.desc: A young and successful doctor is tortured by recurrent nightmares after a child patient dies accidentally. The line between dreams and reality starts to blur when the faceless killer from these nightmares comes to life and hunts her down.

programme.title: Beyond The Headlines: The Gabby Petito Story

programme.desc: A Louisiana trail-ride dance party is cut short when shots ring out. A man dies, and his daughter's partner—who was standing nearby—is accused.

programme.title: After The First 48 (S15)
programme.desc: In Tulsa, a party becomes the scene of a murder. For investigators and prosecutors, the case is riding on two accomplices betraying their friends, despite the risks.

programme.title: Murdered At First Sight (S1)
programme.desc: On 19th December 1995, 19-year-old French hitch-hiker Celine Figard goes missing. Following an appeal, her body is discovered having been raped and bludgeoned to death.

programme.title: Murdered At First Sight (S1)
programme.desc: After a night out with friends, vulnerable India Chipchase is lured into a cab by a stranger promising to get her home safely. The following day, her body is found raped and strangled to death.

programme.title: Beyond The Headlines: The Gabby Petito Story
programme.desc: This special details the ups and downs of the tragic road trip through the lens of Gabby's social media presence. Told by the people who knew her best and a community of online strangers and cyber sleuths.

programme.title: The First 48 (S25)
programme.desc: A man living at an extended-stay hotel is shot dead in his room after a night of gambling with friends turns into more than anyone bargained for.

programme.title: 60 Days In (S7)
programme.desc: Carlos learns why he was removed from the program early. Darius struggles to keep peace in the pod. The serenity within the women's pod is shattered when a minor argument takes a violent turn.

programme.title: Cruise Ship Killers (S2)
programme.desc: Recently retired newlyweds embark on a tropical cruise. The happy and fun-loving couple are enjoying the adventure and romance of this new chapter when tragedy strikes and they are found dead.

programme.title: The Life & Murder Of Nicole Brown Simpson
programme.desc: After Nicole’s murder, OJ's behaviour grows increasingly erratic and bizarre. Placed squarely in the LAPD's crosshairs as the prime suspect, he leads them on a slow-speed chase down the 405.

programme.title: The Life & Murder Of Nicole Brown Simpson
programme.desc: OJ’s behaviour sparks a media frenzy, culminating in a high-profile trial. His ongoing violence raises concerns about what happened to Sydney and Justin.

programme.title: Cold Case Files (S3)
programme.desc: Pam Pitts disappears in 1988 and her charred body is found at a popular hangout spot in the Arizona desert.After the discovery of a second victim, detectives suspect the killer may have known them both.

programme.title: CI Asia: Top Terrorist
programme.desc: Police hunt for the mastermind of the 2009 Jakarta bombing, but are stunned to find the bombing's signature matches that of a long-dead terrorist.

programme.title: #TextMeWhenYouGetHome (S2)
programme.desc: When mother of two, Deanna Cook, missed her daily call to her mom, her family began to worry Deanna's 'stalker' might be involved. After texting and calling Deanna, her family called 911.

programme.title: Panic 9-1-1 (S3)
programme.desc: A woman's ex-husband forces himself into her Arkansas home. While skating on a frozen river, a New Hampshire man falls through the ice into freezing water.

programme.title: Une Autre Histoire
programme.desc: Anémone is disappointed by Vincent's intransigent attitude to the parents of a client, who have money problems. Karla is more confused than ever about her pregnancy and becomes closer to Vincent during a party held at the Café de la Place.

programme.title: Éthique Helvétique
programme.desc: What shaped Swiss thought? By analysing the history of the country, Tristan Miquel and Julien Girardin question the ethical and philosophical challenges facing their society and draw up parallels between the past and the present to stimulate reflection on different schools of thought.

programme.title: Rodéo
programme.desc: Julia has a true passion for motorbikes. One day she meets a gang of urban dirt bike riders and joins their underground world, one mainly made up of young men. But an accident endangers her position as a member of the gang...

programme.title: L'Été Des Chaleurs
programme.desc: On a hot summer's day, a mother needs a break and a child needs to exist.

programme.desc: Summer 2021 kept everyone waiting. For weeks, early each morning the Appenzeller cheese-makers studied the weather for the first signs of summer. Finally, on 17 June, they could head to the Alpine pastures. We meet the Räss family who run the Furgglenalp, and some of those living in eastern Switzerland.

programme.title: Escapades En Suisse Italienne
programme.desc: Plunge into the heart of Ticino to discover enchanting places, explore new hiking trails, enjoy various sports and leisure activities, and savor exceptional local products. A sensory journey through unique and authentic experiences!

programme.title: Bien Bâti
programme.desc: A Lévis family is responsible for preserving a modern mid-century house. In Montreal, the splendours of the Saint-George Anglican church are protected by all levels of government. Encounter with an Indigenous architect.

programme.title: Eurovision : Le Monde De Nemo
programme.desc: ''Switzerland has been awarded 226 points by the public!'': this was how the presenter of Eurovision 2024 announced that Nemo had won with ''The Code''. We look back at the musical stages in the life of the artist from Bienne and the creation of his flagship song.

programme.title: Terra Artistika
programme.desc: For André Boubounelle, painting is both vocation and childhood pleasure, one associated with nature-watching and summer holidays. So much so that he constantly seeks to bring it to life again, portraying it on canvas in his quest for ''reality''...

programme.title: 6H Info
programme.desc: The 6am news bulletin (Paris time) by the France Télévisions editorial team.

programme.title: Télématin
programme.desc: The latest news and laughter, 7 days a week With Flavie Flament and Julien Arnaud on weekdays, Maya Lauqué and Damien Thévenot at weekends.

programme.title: La Cuisine D'Isabelle Et Ricardo
programme.desc: Accompanied by Ricardo, Isabelle cooks chicken curry using her own green curry recipe, together with a Thai iced tea that uses black tea, condensed milk and a coconut-based plant milk.

programme.title: Slam
programme.desc: Three contestants compete in a game of arrow crosswords, trying to complete the grids by finding the answers to the definitions provided. But to have access to those definitions, they first need to answer questions that all share one common characteristic: the response is always a letter.

programme.title: Le Téléjournal De Radio-Canada
programme.desc: The televised news programme from the Radio-Canada team.

programme.title: Bien Bâti
programme.desc: A Lévis family is responsible for preserving a modern mid-century house. In Montreal, the splendours of the Saint-George Anglican church are protected by all levels of government. Encounter with an Indigenous architect.

programme.title: Ligue 1 Mcdonald'S - Avant-Matchs
programme.desc: Presenting the next day of the French football championship.

programme.title: Rocky & Lily : C'Est Dans La Boîte !
programme.desc: Each day, Rocky and Lily receive a new box in the studio. But what's inside? One thing is certain, it's bound to contain a surprise that will lead them to discover a host of very different subjects: from guitars to trolls and even how to sort your waste for recycling!

programme.title: Edmond Et Lucy
programme.desc: Edmond the squirrel and Lucy the bear cub grew up together. They live in a majestic chestnut tree in the heart of the forest. With their friends they solve riddles and live thrilling adventures, with every day bringing new wonders to discover in the natural world around them.

programme.title: Ta Vie Sans Ça
programme.desc: What would life be like without our most everyday objects? Each episode puts a different one in the spotlight. Whether a tap, an umbrella or a toothbrush, they all have a story to tell about their invention and subsequent evolution.

programme.title: Api !
programme.desc: Fatou is upset because she wants to confide something to her friends. But between Laeti, who might not listen to her until the end, and Api, with whom she is still a bit distant, she doesn't know what to do.

programme.title: Mystery Lane
programme.desc: Clever and Bro, two little hamsters, live in a pet shop. She's the big sister, funny and incredibly intelligent; he's her cute little brother, sometimes grumpy, always brave. In their consulting rooms in the shop's basement, they confront the supernatural as they help London's animals solve some very strange goings-on!

programme.title: La Cuisine D'Isabelle Et Ricardo
programme.desc: Accompanied by Ricardo, Isabelle cooks chicken curry using her own green curry recipe, together with a Thai iced tea that uses black tea, condensed milk and a coconut-based plant milk.

programme.title: Tv5Monde, Le Journal
programme.desc: All the national and international news from the TV5MONDE news staff.

programme.title: Tandem
programme.desc: Julius Suton, historian and Nostradamus specialist, is found dead at the foot of the Tour des Pins, a mysterious parchment in his hand. Is it one of the lost prophecies of Nostradamus or does it, as Paul Marchal believes, identify the location of the famous astrologist's hidden skull?

programme.title: Tandem
programme.desc: Brother François has been found dead before the door of his abbey. What was the novice doing outside in the middle of the night? In his cell Paul Marchal discovers a bible filled with strange annotations and a sketch representing the Saint Louis Teardrop, a legendary lost diamond.

programme.title: Terra Artistika
programme.desc: The sculptures created by Agnès Baillon, almost always women, capture our gaze for an exchange steeped in humanity. From Parisian workshop to art gallery, scenes from everyday life displayed free of artifice but rich in nuance.

programme.title: #Investigation
programme.desc: Your rendezvous for current affairs and investigative journalism from the RTBF teams. Research, evidence, personal stories and confrontations are at the heart of the film reports about a range of subjects mainly relating to Belgian society. The key words? Independence and transparency!

programme.title: Tyler Perry's Young Dylan
programme.desc: Dylan and Tara join forces when they realize they have the same hidden agenda. Yasmine is protective over Charlie as the family supports his decorating efforts.

programme.title: Hunter Street
programme.desc: Jennie and Anika hit a dead end with their investigation into the bunny's holocode device, while the hunt for the twins' dad reveals a new name, yet further frustrations.

programme.title: Rock Island Mysteries
programme.desc: The rare appearance of mysterious lights in the sky causes Meesha's Grandmother Gillian to go missing in the jungle. Taylor, Nori, and Meesha must search for Gillian and battle the lights, while Ellis and Lila manage logistics from the Milk Shack.

programme.title: The Thundermans: Undercover
programme.desc: Max bets Phoebe she can't turn off being a superhero and go on a normal date. Chloe helps Phoebe do well on the date, but Max tries to sabotage it by crying wolf. Suddenly, a real supervillain emerges and puts Max and Chloe in serious danger.

programme.title: The Thundermans: Undercover
programme.desc: Cherry visits, and the Thundermans discover she still has her superpowers. Cherry promises to remove them after her girls' day with Phoebe and Chloe, but the powers malfunction and puts the group in danger. Max hosts Jinx, making Colosso jealous.

programme.title: Tales of the Teenage Mutant Ninja Turtles
programme.desc: The Ninja Turtles are on the run and...alone. Leonardo is a leader but who is he without anyone to lead? Leo now has to stop Bishop and her Mechazoids while trying to save his brothers.

programme.title: SpongeBob SquarePants
programme.desc: In order to save money, Mr. Krabs fires SpongeBob. Unable to just “do nothing”, SpongeBob decides to go back to work doing anything, anywhere.

programme.title: The Smurfs
programme.desc: Papa Smurf disappears and the only way to make him visible again is to get a whisker from Azrael! // Wimpy challenges Hefty to a test of strength and wins by accident!

programme.title: The Smurfs
programme.desc: After breaking Papa Smurf's telescope, Scaredy and Hefty disguise themselves as girls to avoid punishment. // Vanity tires of Jokey's exploding box and decides to boobytrap it with an even bigger explosion.

programme.title: The Casagrandes
programme.desc: Ronnie Anne and Sid try to take down the obnoxious burger restaurant that opened up across the street. // After picking Par as his new best friend, Bobby realizes he may be in over his head.

programme.title: The Casagrandes
programme.desc: Ronnie Anne thinks her grandparent's marriage is in trouble after watching a relationship talk show. // Ronnie Anne learns the art of baile folklorico - and that her Tia Frida is one intense instructor!

programme.desc: When Bobby finds out Carl can't swim, he offers to show him the ways of the waves! // After begging Abuelo for some A/C, the cousins decide to earn some cash at the neighborhood fair.

programme.desc: Plankton's family open their own restaurant...directly next to the Chum Bucket. // SpongeBob suddenly finds everything funny...much to everyone's annoyance.

programme.desc: The Krusty Krew get lazy when their moms take over the Krusty Krab. // Patrick's new pet rock catches the eye of a mischievous rock collector.

programme.desc: Squidward's lack of talent lands him in a court ordered music class.

programme.title: The Loud House
programme.desc: After spilling an experiment of Lisa's, Lincoln sets off a chain reaction that unravels the household. // In an effort to be more energy-efficient Lincoln rallies his family to stop using so much electricity.

programme.title: The Smurfs
programme.desc: Clumsy and Dimwitty want to help Rowena cure her sick plant, without knowing it was actually a trap and they are in fact helping her to catch Smurfs. // Rowena decides to turn Vanity and Storm into dolls to play with.

programme.title: The Smurfs
programme.desc: Scaredy Smurf is rescued by Lily and Blizzard. He'd also like a dragon friend to protect him. // Chef Smurf has accidentally brought an old cauldron back to life and it wants revenge for having been abandoned.

programme.title: ALVINNN!!! and The Chipmunks
programme.desc: When Dave learns Alvin blamed him for his poor grades to Miss Smith, Dave sets down a very strict study schedule. // Theodore must pose as a dog after the chipmunks accidently shave the fur off a dog Miss Miller is dog sitting.

programme.desc: Mr. Lou: Theo's funky art project becomes a star with its own social media fans, which is great until the page is hacked! // Dave writes a hit love song from a poem he found. Since Simon wrote the poem he panics his secret will come out.

programme.title: The Loud House

programme.desc: Lincoln is going to his first rock concert, and Luna is determined to make it the greatest experience ever.

programme.desc: SpongeBob and Patrick work a day on Old Man Jenkins' farm, much to his dismay. // Sandy narrates the nocturnal adventures of Gary and his secret pal - Spot.

programme.desc: SpongeBob takes his first break ever at work, but how will he spend his precious time?

programme.desc: Lincoln encourages Clyde to showcase his amazing skills as a drummer, but pushes him too far. Luan meets her comedy idol while performing a comedy gig at Sunset Canyon. And Luna helps Leni ace her history test by utilizing her love of fashion.

programme.title: The Thundermans: Undercover
programme.desc: Billy arrives, hopeful that his new sidekick Steve can join the T-Force. Phoebe and Max consider it, but soon discover that his superpower is making marshmallows. After they reject Steve's bid to join the team, he turns evil and vows revenge.

programme.desc: Max and Phoebe attend Parent-Teacher Night, leaving Chloe and friends home without adult supervision. When Jinx finds the Air Lair, he believes spies are targeting the school, and his meddling puts the Thundermans' school jobs at risk.

programme.title: Danger Force

programme.desc: When Lola learns that Lana is planning their joint birthday, she does everything to stop it. // Lincoln and the Middle School Action News Team solve the mystery of the missing popcorn.

programme.title: Ghost Adventures S1 ep 5
programme.desc: A clairvoyant repairman fearful of ghosts is forced to help them cross over so they can leave him in peace.
